entry.title: RT crypdough.ethᵍᵐ🦇🔊X 🏴🦀: GM, we're live! This is a big milestone for onchain philanthropy and our adoption of Rust. I had a lot of fun ...
entry.summary:
RT crypdough.ethᵍᵐ🦇🔊X 🏴🦀 GM, we're live! This is a big milestone for onchain philanthropy and our adoption of Rust. I had a lot of fun building out the Givepact API and I can’t wait to get it into the hands of developers. Our endpoints open the door for all sorts of creative integrations with dAPPs
Givepact: Today, the Givepact team is excited to launch our API, a seamless way for developers to integrate crypto donations into their products, protocols, and tokenomics. #cryptoforgood 🧵⬇️
